name: A Furlong Too Late
mixingInstructions: Pour the rum and ginger beer into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: A Night In Old Mandalay
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the light rum, añejo rum, orange juice, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the ginger ale. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: A. J.
mixingInstructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Abbey Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients (except for the cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Abilene
mixingInstructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Acapulco
mixingInstructions: Combine and shake all ingredients (except mint) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

name: Adam
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Adonis Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Affair
mixingInstructions: Pour schnapps, orange juice, and cranberry juice over ice in a highball glass. Top with club soda and serve.

name: Affinity
mixingInstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: After Dinner Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

name: After Supper Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Alabama Slammer
mixingInstructions: Pour all ingredients (except for lemon juice) over ice in a highball glass. Stir, add a dash of lemon juice, and serve.

name: Alaska Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass. Drop in a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Alexander
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Alexander #2
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Brandy Alexander
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Alexander's Big Brother
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Alexander's Sister
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, creme de menthe, and heavy cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Alfie Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Algonquin
mixingInstructions: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Allegheny
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Allies Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Almeria
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Almond Joy
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Amaretto And Cream
mixingInstructions: Shake well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Amaretto Mist
mixingInstructions: Pour amaretto in an old-fashioned glass over crushed ice. Add the wedge of lime and serve. (A wedge of lemon may be substituted for lime, if preferred.)

name: Amaretto Rose
mixingInstructions: Pour amaretto and lime juice over ice in a collins glass. Fill with club soda and serve.

name: Amaretto Stinger
mixingInstructions: Shake ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Amaretto Tea
mixingInstructions: Pour hot tea into a pousse-cafe glass, using a spoon in glass to prevent cracking. Add amaretto, but do not stir. Top with chilled whipped cream and serve.

name: Ambrosia
mixingInstructions: Combine and shake all ingredients (except champagne). Pour contents into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with chilled champagne, stir lightly, and serve.

name: Amer Picon Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: American Beauty
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, vermouth, creme de menthe, orange juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Pouring slowly and carefully, float the port on top.

name: Andalusia
mixingInstructions: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Angel Face
mixingInstructions: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Angel's Kiss
mixingInstructions: Pour ingredients carefully, in order given, into a pousse-cafe glass so that they do not mix.

name: Angel's Wing
mixingInstructions: Pour ingredients carefully, in order given, into a pousse-cafe glass so that they do not mix. Serve without mixing.

name: Angler's Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients with cracked ice, pour contents into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Ante
mixingInstructions: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Antoine Special
mixingInstructions: Float vermouth on top of chilled Dubonnet in a red wine glass and serve.

name: Apple Blow Fizz
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Apple Brandy Highball
mixingInstructions: Pour apple brandy over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add a twist of lemon peel on top and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

name: Apple Brandy Sour
mixingInstructions: Shake apple brandy, powdered sugar, and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with a half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Apple Colada
mixingInstructions: Blend schnapps, cream of coconut, half-and-half, and 2 cups of crushed ice in an electric blender at a high speed. Pour contents into a collins glass. Decorate with an apple slice and a cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Apple Pie
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Apple Rum Rickey
mixingInstructions: Pour applejack and rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Squeeze lime and drop in glass. Stir and serve.

name: Applecar
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Appled Rum Cooler
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, applejack, and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the club soda.

name: Apricot Anise Collins
mixingInstructions: Shake gin, brandy, anisette, and lemon juice with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir lightly. Decorate with the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Apricot Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Apricot Lady
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, apricot brandy, triple sec, lemon juice, and egg white. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with the orange slice.

name: Arcadia
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Archbishop
mixingInstructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

name: Arise My Love
mixingInstructions: Put creme de menthe into a champagne flute. Fill with chilled champagne and serve.

name: Arthur Tompkins
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Grand Marnier, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Artillery
mixingInstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: B And B
mixingInstructions: Float brandy on top of Benedictine in a cordial glass without mixing and serve.

name: Babbie's Special Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bacardi Cocktail
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bahama Mama
mixingInstructions: Combine all ingredients and pour over cracked ice in a collins glass. Decorate with a strawberry or cherry and serve.

name: Balmoral
mixingInstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Baltimore Bracer
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Baltimore Eggnog
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Banana Cow
mixingInstructions: Shake rum, creme de banana, cream, and grenadine with crushed ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with the banana slice, sprinkle nutmeg on top, and serve.

name: Banana Daiquiri
mixingInstructions: Combine all ingredients (except for the cherry) with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for five seconds, then blend at a high speed until firm. Pour contents into a champagne flute, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Banana Punch #1
mixingInstructions: Pour brandy, vodka, and juice of lime into a collins glass over crushed ice. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with banana slices and mint sprigs and serve.

name: Banana Rum Cream
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Barbary Coast
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Baron Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon wedge) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the lemon wedge and serve.

name: Barrier Breaker
mixingInstructions: Pour all of the ingreedients into an Irish coffee glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

name: Barton Special
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Basic Bill
mixingInstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Batida Abacaxi
mixingInstructions: Place all of the ingredients into a blender. Blend well. Pour into a wine glass.

name: Batida Mango
mixingInstructions: Place all of the ingredients into a blender. Blend well. Pour into a wine glass.

name: Batida Morango
mixingInstructions: Place all of the ingredients into a blender. Blend well. Pour into a wine glass.

name: Beachcomber
mixingInstructions: Place sugar in a saucer. Rub the rim of a cocktail glass with lime wedge and dip glass into sugar to coat rim thoroughly, reserve lime. In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine rum, maraschino liqueur, cherry brandy, and lime juice. Shake well.

name: Beadlestone Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Beal's Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Beauty Spot Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Pour a dash of grenadine in a cocktail glass. Shake remaining ingredients with ice, strain into glass over grenadine, and serve.

name: Bee Stinger
mixingInstructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Belles Of St. Mary's
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bengal
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bennett Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bentley
mixingInstructions: Stir Calvados and Dubonnet with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Bermuda Highball
mixingInstructions: Pour brandy, gin, and dry vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

name: Bermuda Rose
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bernardo
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, triple sec, lemon juice, and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Betsy Ross
mixingInstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Between The Sheets
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Biffy Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bijou Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients (except the cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Bikini
mixingInstructions: Shake rum, vodka, milk, sugar, and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Billy Taylor
mixingInstructions: Pour gin and juice of lime into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Bishop
mixingInstructions: Shake juice of lemon, juice of orange, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass. Add two ice cubes, fill with burgundy, and stir well. Decorate with various fruits and serve.

name: Bitch-On-Wheels
mixingInstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Black Baltimore
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Black Devil
mixingInstructions: Stir rum and vermouth with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the black olive and serve.

name: Black Hawk
mixingInstructions: Stir blended whiskey and sloe gin with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Blackjack #1
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Black Maria
mixingInstructions: Combine and stir all ingredients in a brandy snifter. Add cracked ice and serve.

name: Black Monday
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Black Pagoda
mixingInstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Black Russian
mixingInstructions: Pour ingredients over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Black Stripe Cold
mixingInstructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a mixing glass and stir well to dissolve the honey and molasses. Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

name: Black Velvet
mixingInstructions: Pour stout into a champagne flute. Add champagne carefully, so it does not mix with stout, and serve.

name: Blackjack #2
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients with cracked ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Blackthorn
mixingInstructions: Stir sloe gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Blarney Stone Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Shake Irish whiskey, anis, triple sec, and maraschino with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel, top with the olive, and serve.

name: Blimey
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake wel. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Blinder
mixingInstructions: Pour the scotch and grapefruit juice into a highball glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink.

name: Bloodhound Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients (except strawberries) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with the 3 crushed strawberries and serve.

name: Bloody Bull
mixingInstructions: Pour vodka, tomato juice, and beef bouillon over ice in a highball glass and stir. Add the slice of lime and the wedge of lemon and serve.

name: Bloody Maria
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with cracked ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Bloody Mary
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

name: Blue Cowboy
mixingInstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine both of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Blue Devil Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Blue Hawaiian
mixingInstructions: Blend light rum, blue curacao, pineapple juice, and cream of coconut with one cup ice in an electric blender at high speed. Pour contents into a highball glass. Decorate with the slice of pineapple and a cherry.

name: Blue Lagoon
mixingInstructions: Pour vodka and curacao over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Blue Margarita
mixingInstructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime juice. Dip rim in coarse salt. Shake tequila, blue curacao, and lime juice with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

name: Blue Mountain
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass alomst filled with ice cubes.

name: Bluebird
mixingInstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine the gin, triple sec, Curacao, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist and the cherry.

name: Bobby Burns Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Bolero
mixingInstructions: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bombay Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Boomerang
mixingInstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, bitters, and maraschino liqueur. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

name: Border Crossing
mixingInstructions: Pour the tequila, lime juice, lemon juice, and cola into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Bosom Caresser
mixingInstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Boston Cocktail
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Boston Sidecar
mixingInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Boston Sour
mixingInstructions: Shake juice of lemon, powdered sugar, blended whiskey, and egg white with cracked ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Bourble
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bourbon and Branch
mixingInstructions: Pour the bourbon and water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Bourbon Black Hawk
mixingInstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon and sloe gin. Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Bourbon Black Hawk #2
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, sloe gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Bourbon Cobbler #1
mixingInstructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the bourbon and stir well. Garnish with the cherry, orange and lemon slices.

name: Bourbon Cobbler #2
mixingInstructions: In a large wine glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Almost will the glass with crushed ice. Add the bourbon. Garnish with starwberry, lime and pineapple wedges.

name: Bourbon Cooler
mixingInstructions: Pour the bourbon and the soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon wedge.

name: Bourbon County Cowboy
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bourbon Daisy
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, lemon juice, grenadine, and sugar. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

name: Bourbon Fix
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, lemon juice, and water. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Add the bourbon. Stir well and garnish with the cherry and the lemon slice.

name: Bourbon Flip
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, egg, sugar, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Bourbon Highball
mixingInstructions: Pour bourbon into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

name: Bourbon Milk Punch
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, half-and half, sugar, and vanilla extract. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Bourbon Milk Punch #2
mixingInstructions: In a highball glass, dissolve the sugar in the bourbon by stirring with a teaspoon. Add 6 ice cubes and the milk. Stir well. Garnish with the cinnamon.

name: Bourbon Milk Punch #3
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, creme de cacao, and milk. Shake well. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Classic Old-Fashioned
mixingInstructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the bitters and water into the sugar cube, using the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes and add the bourbon. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

name: Bourbon Sling
mixingInstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and bourbon. Shake well. Strain well. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.
